lines: Touch not the trees of the Golden Wood!
No evil hand shall slay the trees of Lothl贸rien!
The axes of the Enemy are forbidden here!
Our mallorn trees shall not be felled!
You may not set foot in Lothl贸rien, #p!
No mallorn shall fall by evil hand in these woods!
Those who bring destruction to L贸rien will be met with it themselves!
Evil is not allowed in this land!
How dare you fell the mellyrn of the Golden Wood? Truly you are a servant of evil!
What evil is this? Begone from our lands, spawn of Morgoth.
Foul spawn of Morgoth! You shall pay for defiling the trees of the Golden Wood.
You shall answer for your crimes, #p!
